channel.title: Answer Me Not Ignoring Me Those Questions May Be Helpful To Other People-Delta
channel.description:
Please Help Me in anyway
1-How To make d claws hit 4 times in delta 2-how to make donaters wear only [b]3-how to make pk points shop?????[/b]4-when my player hits 0 other players hp goes lower why????? --------------------------------------------------------------
Delta

item.title: Answer Me Not Ignoring Me Those Questions May Be Helpful To Other People-Delta
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:5, topic:268332”][quote author=ak226688 link=topic=354146.msg2713481#msg2713481 date=1237486789]
nobody likes delta worst ever it shud be deleted from the world
[/quote]
Yeah delta does fail. The only people download delta these days is because it “was” famous. Pfff well everyone has the source now.
Its not popular anymore because everyone has the source.[/quote] I agree delta does fail, but i enjoy coding it, it’s also fun to play on, and FinalFantasy, that gives errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Answer Me Not Ignoring Me Those Questions May Be Helpful To Other People-Delta
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

for d claws:

First make your special look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ //8002 = d claws. specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

And this for npc

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Declare these

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;

Find

public boolean process()

Under it put

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

And

if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

Read full topic
